headline: Cajun Spiced Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
name: Cajun Spiced Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
description: A hint of Cajun seasoning spices up these savory pumpkin seeds. Wash away as much pulp as possible from your seeds and dry them beforehand.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw whole pumpkin seeds, washed and dried
0.75 teaspoon Cajun seasoning, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).

Toss pumpkin seeds with paprika, Cajun seasoning, and salt until coated. Mix Worcestershire sauce with melted butter in a small bowl, pour over seeds, and stir to to combine. Spread seeds onto a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast seeds in the preheated oven until browned and crunchy, 45 minutes to 1 hour; stir and turn seeds several times during roasting.
